name: Antymaymay's Chicken Broccoli Casserole

instructions.en: Cook onion in butter until golden brown; set aside.
Cook broccoli until just barely tender, about 5 minutes; drain well.
Prepare cheese sauce: Microwave cream cheese for 15 seconds. Add cheddar, cream, mustard, and pepper. Microwave 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth.
Mix chicken, broccoli, and cheese sauce in casserole dish. Season if needed.
Top with shredded cheese and cooked onions.
Bake at 350ยบ for about 30 minutes until hot and bubbly.

notes: Makes about 6 servings. Can potentially be frozen. Cheese sauce can also be prepared on stovetop: Heat cream, melt in cream cheese, then gradually add cheddar cheese.
